Reviews.Title: New Lenovo Customer
Reviews.Author: Paul A. Rose
Reviews.Content: I've never had a Lenovo before, but I'm happy with the laptop to this point.  I've only had it a couple weeks, but so fat everything is great!  I am really liking Windows 8, and how it works with this touch screen.  The processor seems fast.  The only complaint I would have, is that the edges of the laptop seem a little sharp when using the keyboard.  My other laptop is a HP, and it I well rounded on the edges.  It's not sharp enough to cut you, but it just seems to me, it should have been rounded off a little.

Reviews.Title: Overall I am happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: Susan J Curry
Reviews.Content: I like everything about this laptop EXCEPT the display. It is rather dull and hard on the eyes, Adjusting the brightness does not help.Having a smartphone helped me adjust to Windows 8. Setup was easy and I like the speed of the computer. I love the 8G of memory and the super big hard drive. I like the built in DVD drive, that means one less accessory to buy and carry around.Because of the less than optimal screen display, I give it 4 stars rather than 5

Reviews.Title: Fantastic machine with great build quality
Reviews.Author: Comp-Freak
Reviews.Content: This is another best machine I have ever used. Screen is fantastic. 8GB ram makes it much sweeter. 4th gen i5 processor is so powerful

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is my second lenovo laptop and it is great, the touch screen works perfect, its very good characteristic about this it. It has great screen, the speakers are very loud.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Joyce A. Stelzer
Reviews.Content: No problems with computer.  Just a slow process in learning windows 8.1.  I bought this to replace a desk top computer.  I am very satisfied with the brand.

Reviews.Title: crashed and burned
Reviews.Author: JayVee
Reviews.Content: I had this laptop a total of two hours. I booted it up, followed the prompts to configure, then loaded Java and updated McAfee, which required a restart. The machine would not boot back up. After spending 30 minutes with Lenovo tech support, who tried to tell me that I must have corrupted the operating system (I used to work software support myself, so I know the tricks), I boxed it back up and I'm returning it to Amazon. The only positive that I can say is that Amazon's return policy is easy and painless (so far). I won't buy another Lenovo because of the condescending attitude of their tech support.

Reviews.Title: Screen color is not good.. :(
Reviews.Author: Rakesh Kumar Raushan
Reviews.Content: The screen appear very dull and after working of one hour my eyes stated paining and dont wanna more see my laptop screen. I have returned it.
